name: Space: Homeland
description:
Explore space, gather resources and fight other species to get money and have fun with your friends in this open-world multiplayer game.
This game is a lan based game. It allows you to play with your friends that are connected on the same network as you but it mean you need to run the server file befor running the game.

The game is in early access. It is developed by a single person (me) and is complex to develop since it is made for multiplayer.

For updates, you can look on the devlog page for more frequent updates on the development process and to be part of the updates if you have any ideas. I will also post my ideas for the next updates on there.

- Made by snappyink

Released Versions:

-Alpha 2  (12/04/2022)

-Alpha 1  (12/02/2022)
